1.title: With This Bullet, I Thee Kill
1.plot: A passionate relationship, a new home, a baby on the way: Avis Banks and Keyon Pittman seem to have it all, until Keyon returned home to find his beloved fiancé lifeless on the floor. In their hunt for Avis' killer, investigators unearth a twisted love triangle, and a secret lover with a deadly obsession.

2.title: Broken Vows, Bloody Murder
2.plot: Pastor Tracy Burleson and his wife Paulette had a loving marriage grounded by their steadfast Christian faith. But the couple's world is torn apart when Paulette is brutally murdered outside their Houston home. As police delve deeper, they uncover a sinful conspiracy of biblical proportions.

3.title: Prisoner of Love
3.plot: Brooklyn native Denetria Council fell head over heels for the handsome and charismatic Jason Page. But within months, a cloud of jealousy and obsession cast a dark shadow over their storybook romance. Then the dark feelings turn violent, and escalate into a gruesome nightmare with no escape in sight.

4.title: Shopping for Murder
4.plot: Derrick and Linda Yancey have been together since high school. The young lovers got married soon after graduation and stayed devoted to each other for more than 20 years. But Derrick would become so infatuated with money that it eventually would cost him and Linda everything.

5.title: A Devil in Uniform
5.plot: Samira Watkins had fallen hard for naval officer, Zachary Littleton. But when Samira inexplicably goes missing, the search to find her would unveil a tightly wound web of secrets and lies. And when this web begins to unravel, it exposes a hidden evil that will tear a family apart.

6.title: A Cry in the Dark
6.plot: Tameka Claiborne and Michael Solomon seemed like the perfect couple. But in 2010, Tameka and Michael both went missing. In their hunt to recover the missing couple, police would uncover a sordid trail of lies, abuse, and deception. A trail that ultimately leads to murder.

7.title: Blazing Fury
7.plot: Nikki McPhatter had just begun a torrid romance with a man she met online. But Nikki's love life took a horrifying turn when she suddenly went missing. The search for the truth would uncover a conspiracy of deception and revenge. And expose a deadly monster hidden in plain sight.

8.title: Till Death Do Us Part
8.plot: Tamika and Quincy Norton seemed like the perfect couple. But their dream life was shattered when one of them fell victim to a horrendous crime. To uncover the truth, investigators would unravel a twisted tale of deceit and revenge. And determine how a collision of desires became a road map to murder.

1.title: Ambushed by Love
1.plot: Title: "Ambushed By Love" Craig and Cynthia Anderson were madly in love, but it wasn't long before their fairytale romance was put to the test. When a man intrudes on the Anderson's property, they gun him down and claim self-defense. However, when he survives the incident, investigators learn there may be more to this story than meets the eye.

2.title: The Devil Beside Me
2.plot: Winston and Darlene George seemed to have the perfect marriage, but a tragic act of violence would rip them apart forever. When investigators begin to search for answers, they discover a tangled web of sex, lies, and greed.

3.title: Collegiate Killing
3.plot: A bright future and a loving fiancée, grad student Denita Smith seemed to have it all - until she was found at the bottom of her stairs, a bullet hole in the back of her head. Who would want to kill Denita?

4.title: Kristopher Miller-The Sinner and the Saint
4.plot: Title: "The Sinner and the Saint" Kristopher Miller and Kim Griffin had just begun their steamy new romance when a tragic crime would stop it dead in its tracks. Investigators initially expect the crime to be linked to gang violence, which is prevalent in the area. However, after digging deeper they discover a chilling tale of jealousy and vengeance.

5.title: Ahkenya Johnson-Murder in Niagara
5.plot: Title: "Murder in Niagara" On the surface, Robert and Ahkenya Johnson had a picture perfect marriage. But according to friends and family, Robert's behavior had become increasingly erratic. When the mother of two is found by her husband was he the last person to see her alive? He's got an alibi, but will it convince authorities and Ahkenya's family?

6.title: Tamika Huston
6.plot: Title: "Tragic Rebound" Tamika Huston had big dreams of becoming a singer and a promising future ahead of her, but when she inexplicably goes missing, friends and family worry they'll never get to see her reach her full potential. The search for answers will lead law enforcement down a slew of different paths-will they ever be able to track down this beautiful young songstress?

7.title: Brian Hughes-Hell Hath No Fury
7.plot: Title: "Hell Hath No Fury" Brian and Elicia Hughes seemed to have a picture perfect marriage; high school sweethearts with two daughters and a nice home in an affluent neighborhood. But when a 911 call leads to a disturbing crime, their perfect life turns up to be not so perfect.

8.title: Sins and Secrets
8.plot: Title: "Sins and Secrets" Pastor Anthony Hopkins and his wife, Arletha, were living their dreams with their seven beautiful children. Years later, someone comes forward with a shocking revelation that will prove there was more to Arletha's death than anyone could ever imagine.

9.title: Antwan Wolford-Budding Bloodshed
9.plot: Title: "Budding Bloodshed" Tiffany and Antwan fell head over heels in love for each other, but once Tiffany had Antwan's child, she found starting a family in high school was far from easy. And when an argument between the two lovers leaves Antwan dead, everyone's wondering what could push this girl to kill her first love.

10.title: Raging Revenge
10.plot: Tawanna Barnes-Copeland seemed to have it all - three beautiful daughters and a budding romance. Until one fateful day when her daughter came home to find the unthinkable. The investigation would leave detectives wondering - was Tawanna the victim of a deadly robbery? Or was there someone out there who wanted her dead?

11.title: Horror on the Highway
11.plot: Title: Horror on the Highway ... The story of Ryan and Serika Holness begins in Jamaica, but ends tragically in a Maryland field. Ryan's reports of a carjacker sends police on a manhunt but when detectives add up the evidence, they start to believe the killer may be closer than they think.

12.title: If I Can't Have You
12.plot: When dashing young Michael Brooks falls for a sexy older woman named Dorothy Washington, their desire for each other can't be contained. But when Michael is brutally gunned down inside Dorothy's apartment, their steamy romance would be forever put on hold. As law enforcement attempt to piece together what happened, they uncover a twisted tale of lies, jealousy, and violence.

13.title: Fallen Hero
13.plot: When Officer Wayne Irby stops by Denise Miller's home on a courtesy call, she falls hard for the man in uniform. But when both Wayne and Denise turn up missing, his fellow officers find out just how mad love can be.

14.title: Texas Tragedy
14.plot: When beautiful young coed Tynesha Stewart goes missing just miles from her boyfriend's apartment, her family and friends grow more anxious by the hour. But a shocking confession from a familiar face not only divulges Tynesha's fate, but also the presence of a true monster, and a sickening crime.

15.title: A Lethal Love Affair
15.plot: Young newlyweds Latrese and Darin Curtis were reveling in the joy of their fledgling marriage-but no sooner had they begun their new life together than Latrese would be murdered in a horrific act of violence. Found stabbed to death on the side of a busy highway, investigators are puzzled as to who would want to harm such a beloved young woman in such a brutal fashion. The search for answers will uncover a tangled web of sex, lies, and salacious secrets that will shock even the most seasoned investigators.

16.title: Burning Rage
16.plot: Latonya Bowman and Jamal Rogers were one month shy of welcoming their baby boy into the world when the unthinkable happened. Latonya is kidnapped, set on fire, shot, and left for dead. As Latonya fights to save her life and the life of her unborn son, detectives try to figure out who would want to harm her - and in such a violent way. As this mystery begins to unravel they uncover a selfish murder plot that sends shock waves throughout the Detroit community - and the entire country.

17.title: All in the Family
17.plot: When mother of three Kenyatae Collier-Brewer goes missing, her husband Darron immediately notifies police. The search is on for this beloved nurse before time runs out. But after investigators uncover her abandoned vehicle, they are quickly thrust into a twisted tale of deception and betrayal.

18.title: Harvard Homicide
18.plot: Brittany Smith and Jabrai Copney were a young collegiate power-couple who had the world at their fingertips. But their textbook romance is cut short when a young man is murdered in broad daylight on Harvard's campus - where Brittany is a proud student. When Brittany inexplicably goes missing soon after this tragedy occurs, investigators wonder if there might have been two victims. When they dig deeper, they'll uncover a tangled web of lies that will shock the entire Cambridge community.

19.title: Deadly Rampage
19.plot: A modern day Bonnie and Clyde, Shanda Merritt and Carl Davis had penchant for criminal behavior. But when Carl decides to leave Shanda and go on the straight and narrow, it sparks a chain reaction of heinous acts leaving one man dead and another in critical condition.

20.title: Love Triangle Tragedy
20.plot: When 22-year-old airport baggage handler Erika Yancey goes missing, friends and family scramble with law enforcement to find her. Erika had a habit of meeting strangers online, which leads her family to fear that she may have gotten caught up with the wrong person. But once the search gets going, a steamy affair and a tangled love triangle will be revealed that will send the case spiraling in a whole new direction. The question isn't only if they'll find Erika...it's if they'll find her alive.

21.title: Pure Evil
21.plot: Eddy Curry and Nova Henry have a relationship that turns rocky once Eddy is drafted to the NBA and she has two of his children. But when Nova and her 10-month old daughter Ava turn up dead in the wake of a child support case, police are baffled as to what monster could commit such a heinous crime.

22.title: Millionaire Murder
22.plot: Lance Herndon was renown throughout Atlanta for being one of the city's most successful businessmen and dashing playboys. Celebrated for his rigorous work ethic and lavish parties, Lance was viewed as Atlanta's own "Great Gatsby." But when his mother finds him bludgeoned to death one morning in his bedroom, no one can fathom what Lance could have done to deserve such a graphic beating. After a slew of greedy mistresses are unveiled, they become investigators' prime suspects-but could any of these petite women really be capable of such a violent crime?

5.title: Dance of Death
5.plot: Debbie Flores-Narvaez was a beautiful showgirl looking to fall in love. But when she vanishes without a trace, investigators can't help but wonder if she had gotten caught up in the lifestyle of the night and had ended up as just another of the lost souls missing from the City of Sin. But when Debbie's car turns up across town, investigators uncover a love triangle involving the reigning queen of the Vegas showgirls and a dark secret so lurid it could be worth killing for.

6.title: Deadly Jealousy
6.plot: Jennifer Lewis never expected that she'd have a relationship as meaningful as the one she had with God, but that changed when she met the charming and devout, Melvin Reed. And soon a fast and deep romance blossomed, held together by their mutual love of God. But Jennifer and Melvin's romance is snuffed out prematurely when Jennifer is shot on campus at close-range. Is it possible a secret from her past has come back to haunt her or had her search for love put her in contact with something much more sinister...

As investigators delve into the case, they are soon led on a frenzied manhunt for a diabolical killer, in the process revealing a murky world where greed and betrayal take the front seat.

3.title: Fight or Flight
3.plot: A Secret Love Life Turns to Tragedy. A double life and a secret love affair turns deadly. Flight attendant Traci Todd had it all: a chic apartment in vibrant Chicago, a dream job that showed her the world, and a storybook romance with a handsome entrepreneur. But when she vanishes into thin air, investigators launch a search that leads them into the shadowy depths of a forest preserve, where telltale signs of murder lie hidden among the leaves and trees.
